TopicTitle: Robocraft mod, Will it be real? (Had to reupload cause I forgot where the old one is)

Articles.Content:
So you played Robocraft and thought its a good game, And you think "Geez, will there be a mod which adds all parts from Robocraft into KSP?" I bet that this would make every Robocraft players very happy. Bonus:Is there a mod that make it so a AI controls a ship for you? That would be good with the Robocraft mod.

NOTE:If I ever see someone make this mod I will love them forever, Good buy and have a nice day.

P.S Im a flying fish!

I've never heard of Robocraft, neat.

I found a link to the parts.. most look like they already have equivalents in KSP.

Movable robotic parts: Infernal Robotics

Weapons: BDArmory, Skillful

AI/automation: kOS, MechJeb, Smart Parts

Bonus:Is there a mod that make it so a AI controls a ship for you? That would be good with the Robocraft mod.

BDArmory is your friend
